price: 我们曾为窃听而常常坐在天上可坐的地方。现在谁去窃听，谁就发现一颗灿烂的星宿在等着他。
arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā kunnā naqʿudu min'hā maqāʿida lilssamʿi faman yastamiʿi al-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadan
